languages.text: "Действовать практично. Во владении Вашей Светлости помимо крупных миров есть крохотные колонии-аванпосты, слишком ничтожные в масштабах протектората, но сулящие богатство обычному человеку. Учитывая профессию госпожи Хейдари, ей бы очень пригодилась возможность в любой момент выйти на покой, удалиться в пусть и небольшие, но личные владения... В которых она будет пребывать в безопасности от нападок мстительных конкурентов".

"To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many worlds, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."
languages.original_text: "Действовать практично. Во владении Вашей Светлости помимо крупных миров есть крохотные колонии-аванпосты, слишком ничтожные в масштабах протектората, но сулящие богатство обычному человеку. В которых она будет пребывать в безопасности от нападок мстительных конкурентов".

traits.locale_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many a world, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she wouldn't say no to the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she wouldn't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful competitors."

languages.text: "Ich würde die Sache praktisch angehen. Das Reich Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} umspannt viele Welten, sowohl große Planeten als auch winzige koloniale Außenposten, die im Rahmen des Protektorats von Valancius nahezu unbedeutend sind, aber für eine normale Person dennoch ein Vermögen darstellen. Angesichts Herrin Heydaris Beruf würde es ihr vielleicht gefallen, sich bei Bedarf in eine sichere Zuflucht zurückziehen zu können. Ihr eigenes bescheidenes Besitztum ... und ein Ort, wo sie die Pläne ihrer rachsüchtigen Konkurrenten nicht zu fürchten braucht."
languages.original_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many worlds, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde die Sache praktisch angehen. Das Reich Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} umspannt viele Welten, sowohl große Planeten als auch winzige koloniale Außenposten, die im Rahmen des Protektorats von Valancius nahezu unbedeutend sind, aber für eine normale Person dennoch ein Vermögen darstellen. Angesichts Herrin Heydaris Beruf würde es ihr vielleicht gefallen, sich bei Bedarf in eine sichere Zuflucht zurückziehen zu können. Ihr eigenes bescheidenes Besitztum ... und ein Ort, wo sie die Pläne ihrer rachsüchtigen Konkurrenten nicht zu fürchten braucht."

languages.text: « Je vous conseillerais de réfléchir de façon pragmatique. Le territoire de Votre Seigneurie englobe de nombreux mondes, incluant aussi bien des planètes majeures que de minuscules avant-postes coloniaux, presque insignifiants à l'échelle du protectorat von Valancius, mais pouvant malgré tout faire la fortune d'une personne ordinaire. Au vu de la profession de maîtresse Heydari, elle apprécierait sans doute grandement de pouvoir se mettre à l'abri en cas de besoin. Dans un modeste refuge qui lui appartiendrait... et où elle n'aurait pas à craindre les complots de rivaux cherchant à se venger. »
languages.original_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many worlds, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous conseillerais de réfléchir de façon pragmatique. Le territoire de Votre Seigneurie englobe de nombreux mondes, incluant aussi bien des planètes majeures que de minuscules avant-postes coloniaux, presque insignifiants à l'échelle du protectorat von Valancius, mais pouvant malgré tout faire la fortune d'une personne ordinaire. Au vu de la profession de maîtresse Heydari, elle apprécierait sans doute grandement de pouvoir se mettre à l'abri en cas de besoin. Dans un modeste refuge qui lui appartiendrait... et où elle n'aurait pas à craindre les complots de rivaux cherchant à se venger. »

languages.text: “如果是从实际情况出发的话，大人，您的王朝横跨诸多世界，其中既包括主要行星，也包括微不足道的殖民哨站。或许这些哨站对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝而言微不足道，但依然能为普通人带来巨额财富。考虑到海达利女士的行当，她或许希望等她金盆洗手的时候，能找到个安全的避风港，住在属于她自己的庄园中……在那里，她不必再担心她曾经的敌人上门寻仇。”
languages.original_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many worlds, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."

traits.locale_text: “如果是从实际情况出发的话，大人，您的王朝横跨诸多世界，其中既包括主要行星，也包括微不足道的殖民哨站。或许这些哨站对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝而言微不足道，但依然能为普通人带来巨额财富。考虑到海达利女士的行当，她或许希望等她金盆洗手的时候，能找到个安全的避风港，住在属于她自己的庄园中……在那里，她不必再担心她曾经的对手找上门寻仇。”

languages.text: 「この件は現実的に考えることにいたましょう。陛下の領域は、主要惑星から極小の植民用前哨地まで、多くの惑星に及んでおります。後者はフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領の規模からすればほとんど取るに足らないものですが、普通の人間にとっては莫大な財産です。ミストレス・ヘイダリの取引の好みから考えますと、必要に応じて避難できるような安息の地が好まれるでしょう。自身のささやかな領地と…執念深いライバルの陰謀を恐れずに済む場所をね」
languages.original_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many worlds, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."

traits.locale_text: 「この件については現実的に考えることにいたましょう。陛下の領域は、主要惑星から極小の植民用前哨地まで、多くの惑星に及んでおります。後者はフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領の規模からすればほとんど取るに足らないものですが、普通の人間にとっては莫大な財産です。ミストレス・ヘイダリの取引の選好から考えますと、必要に応じて避難できるような安息の地をお気に召すでしょう。自身のささやかな領地と…執念深い競争者の陰謀を恐れずに済む場所をね」

languages.text: «Abordemos esto desde un punto de vista práctico. El dominio de {mf|milord|milady} abarca muchos mundos, desde planetas principales hasta pequeños puestos coloniales que son insignificantes en comparación con el protectorado de von Valancius, pero un tesoro para cualquier persona común. Dada la elección de negocio de la señora Heydari, es posible que le interese retirarse a un refugio seguro cuando se dé la necesidad. Un humilde dominio solo para ella... y un lugar donde no tendrá que temer las maquinaciones de sus vengativos rivales».
languages.original_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s domain spans many worlds, both major planets and minuscule colonial outposts that are nigh-insignificant on the scale of the von Valancius protectorate but could still bring great fortune to an ordinary person. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."

traits.locale_text: «Abordemos esto desde un punto de vista práctico. El dominio de {mf|milord|milady} abarca muchos mundos, desde planetas principales hasta pequeños puestos coloniales que son insignificantes en comparación con el protectorado de von Valancius, pero un tesoro para cualquier persona común. Dada la elección de negocio de la señora Heydari, es posible que le interese retirarse a un refugio seguro cuando se dé la necesidad. Un humilde dominio solo para ella... y un lugar donde no tendría que temer las maquinaciones de sus vengativos competidores».

languages.text: "Pratik yaklaşmayı. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin mülkleri arasında von Valancius protektorası ölçeğinde ehemmiyeti olmayan lakin sıradan insanlara büyük şans getirebilecek birçok büyük gezegen ve küçük sömürge karakolları bulunuyor. Üstat Heydari'nin mesleki tercihleri göz önüne alındığında, ihtiyaç duyulduğunda güvenli bir limana çekilme seçeneğinden pek hoşnut olabilir. Kendi mütevazı egemenlik alanına ve intikam peşindeki rakiplerinin planlarından korkmasına gerek kalmayacak bir yere..."
languages.original_text: "To go about this with a practical mind. Given Mistress Heydari's choice of trade, she might quite like the option of retiring to a safe haven whenever the need arises. Her own humble demesne... and a place where she won't need to fear the schemes of her vengeful rivals."

Üstat Heydari'nin mesleki tercihleri göz önüne alındığında, ihtiyaç duyulduğunda güvenli bir limana çekilme seçeneğinden pek hoşnut olabilir. Kendi mütevazı egemenlik alanına ve intikam peşindeki rakiplerinin planlarından korkmasına gerek kalmayacak bir yere..."
